desc:
The Sinners is a dynamic frontend website exclusively tailored for Dota 2 enthusiasts. It serves as a comprehensive platform that offers a wealth of information and features related to the popular online game. Users can delve into the latest news, patch notes, game updates, hero details, team match results, and leaderboard rankings, all in one centralized hub. With a focus on providing a seamless user experience, the website boasts an intuitive interface and client-side routing, allowing smooth transitions between pages without the need for page reloads. Furthermore, the integration of serverless functions ensures real-time data retrieval and processing, ensuring that users receive up-to-date information at their fingertips.

The Sinners goes beyond being a mere information hub. It incorporates advanced functionality by utilizing technologies like React, Styled-Components, and React Query. This enables users to enjoy interactive filtering and sorting options, empowering them to navigate through the vast Dota 2 content with ease. Moreover, the website's responsive design ensures a seamless experience across various devices, from desktop computers to smartphones and tablets, making Dota 2 knowledge accessible anytime, anywhere.

In summary, The Sinners stands as a go-to destination for Dota 2 enthusiasts, providing an all-encompassing platform to keep them informed and engaged. With its user-friendly interface, seamless navigation, real-time data updates, and responsive design, the website guarantees an immersive and accessible experience. Whether it's staying up-to-date with the latest news, diving into hero details, exploring match results, or simply browsing the leaderboard rankings, The Sinners caters to the diverse needs of Dota 2 enthusiasts, making it a must-visit destination for avid gamers.
keyHighlights: Implemented features such as displaying match data between Dota 2 teams, comprehensive hero information, blogs, news, and patch updates.
Acquired valuable knowledge and hands-on experience in working with APIs to fetch real-time match data and hero statistics.
Significantly improved user engagement and satisfaction by providing a seamless and interactive Dota 2 experience.
conceptsCovered: Client-side routing using React Router to enable seamless transitions between pages without reloading the entire app.
Seamless integration of the Dota 2 API to provide real-time data.
Dynamic rendering of content for up-to-date information.
Responsive design ensuring optimal display across devices.
Utilization of popular third-party libraries, including React Query, for enhanced functionality.
User-friendly interface with intuitive navigation and layout.
